Monster Rancher Makes The Cover of a Magazine in US!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Monster Rancher Makes The Cover of a Magazine in US!
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, June 7, 2000 - 09:32 pm:

I just picked up the July issue of Pojo's Card Collector World, with Monster Rancher on the cover! There's a good article about the all the games, the TV show and the new card game. There's also a poster inside!
